The goal of ladybird is to analyse the occurrences of several species of ladybird beetles [_Coccinellidae_](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coccinellidae) in Belgium, the Netherlands and the UK.
The data spans a period before and after the introduction of the invasive ladybird beetle [_Harmonia axyridis_](https://www.gbif.org/species/4989904)

## Installation

You can install the package from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("inbo/ladybird")
```
